statements: SELECT * FROM follower_growth_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, follower_count FROM follower_growth_data WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05;
SELECT user_id, follower_count, engagement_rate, date_recorded FROM follower_growth_data ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM follower_growth_data WHERE follower_count BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT user_id, follower_count FROM follower_growth_data WHERE engagement_rate < 0.03 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, follower_count, engagement_rate, date_recorded FROM follower_growth_data WHERE follower_count > 100 ORDER BY follower_count DESC, engagement_rate ASC
SELECT user_id, engagement_rate, follower_count, date_recorded FROM follower_growth_data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date_recorded
SELECT date_recorded, follower_count, user_id, engagement_rate FROM follower_growth_data WHERE engagement_rate > 2.5 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
SELECT user_id, follower_count, engagement_rate, date_recorded FROM follower_growth_data WHERE follower_count > 500 AND engagement_rate < 1.0 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT user_id, follower_count, engagement_rate, date_recorded FROM follower_growth_data WHERE date_recorded < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY engagement_rate ASC, user_id
SELECT * FROM follower_growth WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, followers_count FROM follower_growth WHERE date = '2021-01-02';
SELECT SUM(followers_count) AS total_followers FROM follower_growth WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT user_id, date, likes_count FROM engagement_rates WHERE user_id = 2 AND date > '2021-02-01';
SELECT user_id, date, likes_count, comments_count FROM engagement_rates WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT user_id, followers_count FROM follower_growth ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, date, likes_count, comments_count FROM engagement_rates WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT user_id, followers_count FROM follower_growth WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM engagement_rates WHERE likes_count > comments_count
SELECT * FROM follower_growth JOIN engagement_rates ON follower_growth.user_id = engagement_rates.user_id ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM follower_growth;
SELECT id, date, followers_count FROM follower_growth WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT date, growth_rate FROM follower_growth ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, followers_count, growth_rate FROM follower_growth WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, strategy_name, engagement_rate, effectiveness_score FROM strategy_effectiveness ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM follower_growth ORDER BY date DESC, followers_count ASC;
SELECT id, date, growth_rate FROM follower_growth WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, date, strategy_name, effectiveness_score FROM strategy_effectiveness WHERE strategy_name = 'Content Marketing' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, post_count, like_count, comment_count FROM engagement_rate WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY like_count DESC;
SELECT id, date, engagement_rate FROM engagement_rate WHERE post_count > 10 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM follower_growth;
SELECT account_id, date, new_followers FROM follower_growth;
SELECT total_followers, date, account_id FROM follower_growth ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, engagement_score FROM strategy_effectiveness WHERE growth_rate > 0.5;
SELECT account_name, handle FROM social_media_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Instagram';
SELECT * FROM follower_growth;
SELECT account_id, total_followers FROM follower_growth WHERE date = '2021-10-01';
SELECT date, likes, shares, comments FROM engagement_rates ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score FROM strategy_effectiveness GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT account_name, handle, account_type FROM social_media_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Instagram';
SELECT * FROM follower_growth ORDER BY date DESC, followers ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, engagement_rate FROM engagement_rate WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM social_media_strategy WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM strategy_performance WHERE engagement_rate < 0.3 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_details ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM follower_growth ORDER BY date DESC, followers ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, followers FROM follower_growth WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM social_media_strategy WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100;

SELECT s.strategy_name, p.engagement_rate FROM social_media_strategy s JOIN strategy_performance p ON s.id = p.strategy_id WHERE p.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY p.engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS campaign_duration FROM campaign_details ORDER BY campaign_duration DESC, campaign_name ASC LIMIT 5;
